short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the price of sold out items in etsy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays the price of an already sold Etsy product directly on the page. 

Etsy no longer displays the prices of sold items on the details page. This extension makes the selling price visible again.
